items.title: Rust Setup & Environment
items.body:
Install Rust and set up development environment.
Resources:
- [Install Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/tools/install)
- [VS Code Rust Extension](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=rust-lang.rust-analyzer)
Deadline: 2025-08-15

items.title: Rust Basics: Variables, Data Types, Ownership
items.body:
Learn Rust basics and practice.
Resources:
- [Rust Book - Ch 3](https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ch03-00-common-programming-concepts.html)
- [Rustlings Exercises](https://github.com/rust-lang/rustlings)
Deadline: 2025-08-16

items.title: Rust Control Flow & Functions
items.body:
Understand if/else, loops, and functions.
Resources:
- [Rust Book - Ch 4 & 5](https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ch04-00-understanding-ownership.html)
Deadline: 2025-08-17

items.title: Rust Structs, Enums, Pattern Matching
items.body:
Practice defining and using structs/enums.
Resources:
- [Rust Book - Ch 6](https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ch06-00-enums.html)
Deadline: 2025-08-18

items.title: Rust Collections (Vec, HashMap)
items.body:
Learn how to store and manipulate collections.
Resources:
- [Rust Book - Ch 8](https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ch08-00-common-collections.html)
Deadline: 2025-08-19

items.title: Rust Error Handling
items.body:
Learn about Result, Option, unwrap, match.
Resources:
- [Rust Book - Ch 9](https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ch09-00-error-handling.html)
Deadline: 2025-08-20

items.title: Rust CLI Tool Planning
items.body:
Plan CLI tool features & commands.
Resources:
- [Clap crate](https://docs.rs/clap/latest/clap/)
Deadline: 2025-08-21

items.title: Rust CLI Tool: Basic Structure
items.body:
Set up main.rs, parse CLI args.
Resources:
- [Rust CLI Example](https://rust-cli.github.io/book/)
Deadline: 2025-08-22

items.title: Rust CLI Tool: Core Logic
items.body:
Implement core business logic.
Resources:
- [Error Handling](https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ch09-02-recoverable-errors-with-result.html)
Deadline: 2025-08-23

items.title: Rust CLI Tool: File I/O
items.body:
Read/write files in Rust.
Resources:
- [std::fs Docs](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/fs/)
Deadline: 2025-08-24

items.title: Rust CLI Tool: Testing
items.body:
Write unit & integration tests.
Resources:
- [Testing in Rust](https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ch11-00-testing.html)
Deadline: 2025-08-25

items.title: Rust CLI Tool: Packaging
items.body:
Package CLI for distribution.
Resources:
- [Cargo Book](https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/)
Deadline: 2025-08-26

items.title: Go Setup & Basics
items.body:
Install Go and learn syntax.
Resources:
- [Go Install](https://go.dev/doc/install)
- [Tour of Go](https://go.dev/tour/welcome/1)
Deadline: 2025-08-27

items.title: Go Structs, Interfaces, Goroutines
items.body:
Practice Go OOP & concurrency.
Resources:
- [Go by Example](https://gobyexample.com/)
Deadline: 2025-08-28

items.title: Go Simple API
items.body:
Create REST API in Go.
Resources:
- [Fiber Framework](https://gofiber.io/)
Deadline: 2025-08-29
